/tips/index.html.title: Illustrator Best Practices | EyeOdin
/tips/index.html.description: Various tips to help with vtuber creation

tips.problem: All Layers and Folders have unique names

tips.solution: Possible mirror axis from float value

tips.problem: Document has mirror axis at width's center
tips.solution: Mirror ambiguity when fixing mirror errors
Slower rig production and unequal deformations between left and right

tips.problem: Elements are painted fully even when behind other elements
Full body exists even behind clothes
tips.solution: Anatomically correct rotations and extra outfit possibilities

tips.problem: Distorted elements in neutral pose have a non-distorted element copy
tips.solution: Texture erosion from undistorting the element

tips.problem: Elements are not just thin lines
Lineart is preserved as a copy when line and fill are merged together
Creation of a character sheet with various views
tips.solution: Elements hidden in forward neutral pose can be conceptualized

tips.problem: Creation of elements for poses higher than 45 degree turns
tips.solution: Stiff rig that only looks forward

tips.problem: Elements for light and shadow in another layer
tips.solution: Static lights baked into the skin

tips.problem: Creation of extra replacement elements for animations
Clumped hair is separated by layers
